name: SJW Group
description: SJW Group is a publicly traded water utility holding company that provides essential water and wastewater services to communities in California and Texas. Founded in 1866, SJW Group is one of the oldest investor-owned water utilities in the United States, and it operates through its subsidiaries, including San Jose Water Company and SJWTX, Inc. The company is committed to providing high-quality water service while maintaining a strong focus on sustainability and environmental stewardship. SJW Group's operations are guided by a mission to enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves through reliable water service, community engagement, and proactive infrastructure investments. The company is also focused on innovative water conservation programs and efficient resource management to address the challenges posed by climate change and drought. Through its commitment to sustainable practices, SJW Group aims to ensure that its customers have access to clean and safe drinking water for generations to come. The company also engages in various community outreach programs to educate the public on water conservation and environmental protection.

key_executives.name: Mark M. S. R. M. T. H. B. D. McGowan

seo.meta_title: SJW Group | Water Utility Services and Sustainability
seo.meta_description: SJW Group is a leading water utility provider dedicated to delivering high-quality water and wastewater services while promoting sustainability and community engagement.

faq.question: What services does SJW Group provide?
faq.answer: SJW Group provides water and wastewater services to residential and commercial customers.

faq.question: Where is SJW Group headquartered?
faq.answer: SJW Group is headquartered in San Jose, California, USA.

faq.question: What is SJW Group's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: SJW Group is committed to environmental stewardship and implementing water conservation programs.
